# UITextItem.MenuConfiguration.Preview.default

**Case**

An option to show the default system preview alongside the text item’s menu.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Getting the preview options

- **UITextItem.MenuConfiguration.Preview.view(_:)**: An option to show the view you provide alongside the text item’s menu.

items.description: An option to show the view you provide alongside the text item’s menu.
